metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Drain on paper towels and serve
o Add diced tomatoes fish stock wine saffron thyme salt and pepper simmer
o Mix coconut milk with cooked rice and let sit for 10 minutes

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
o Drain on paper towels and serve.
Farofa
•
Ingredients:
o 2 cups cassava flour
o 1/4 cup butter
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup bacon
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon salt
•
Instructions:
o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy.
o Add cassava flour and cook, stirring constantly, until golden.
o Stir in chopped parsley and salt.
o Serve warm.
Fattoush
•
Ingredients:
o 2 pita breads
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1/4 cup mint
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon sumac
o 1 teaspoon salt
•
Instructions:
o Toast pita breads until crispy, then break into pieces.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Mix vegetables with chopped parsley and mint.
o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, sumac, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve.
Fava
•
Ingredients:
o 1 cup yellow split peas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1 teaspoon salt

Chicken Caesar Wrap
Ingredients:
•
1 whole wheat tortilla
•
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced
•
1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped
•
2 tablespoons Caesar dressing
•
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese
•
Optional: croutons for extra crunch
Instructions:
•
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly.
•
Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese.
•
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.
Quinoa Salad
Ingredients:
•
1 cup cooked quinoa
•
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
•
1/2 cucumber, diced
•
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped
•
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled
•
2 tablespoons olive oil
•
1 tablespoon lemon juice
•
Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions:
•
In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese.
•
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
•
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.
Turkey and Avocado Sandwich
Ingredients:
•
2 slices whole grain bread
•
4 slices turkey breast
•
1/2 avocado, sliced
•
1/2 cup spinach leaves
•
1 tablespoon mustard or mayo
Instructions:
•
Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread.
•
Layer the turkey, avocado, and spinach on top.
•
Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
•
1 pie crust
•
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
•
1 small onion, diced
•
1 cup grated Gruyère cheese
•
3 eggs
•
1 cup heavy cream
•
1/2 teaspoon salt
•
1/4 teaspoon pepper
Instructions:
•
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
•
Place pie crust in a pie dish.
•
Sprinkle cooked bacon, diced onion, and grated Gruyère cheese over the crust.
•
In a bowl, whisk eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper.
•
Pour egg mixture over the filling.
•
Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden.
•
Serve warm.
Ramen
Ingredients:
•
4 cups chicken broth
•
1/4 cup soy sauce
•
2 tablespoons miso paste
•
2 cloves garlic, minced
•
1 piece ginger, sliced
•
1/2 pound pork belly, sliced
•
4 eggs, soft-boiled
•
8 ounces ramen noodles
•
Sliced green onions, nori, and sesame seeds for garnish
Instructions:
•
In a large pot, bring chicken broth, soy sauce, miso paste, minced garlic, and sliced
ginger to a boil.
•
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
•
In a skillet, cook sliced pork belly until crispy.
•
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions.
•
Divide noodles among bowls, top with broth, pork belly, soft-boiled eggs, sliced green
onions, nori, and sesame seeds.
•
Serve immediately.

o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer
for 20 minutes.
o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done.
o Serve hot with crusty bread.
Bratkartoffeln (Fried Potatoes)
•
Ingredients:
o 4 potatoes
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup bacon
o 2 tablespoons butter
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
•
Instructions:
o Boil potatoes until tender, then slice.
o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.
o Sauté sliced potatoes and diced onion in butter until golden.
o Stir in bacon, salt, and pepper.
o Serve warm.
Briam
•
Ingredients:
o 2 potatoes
o 2 zucchinis
o 2 eggplants
o 2 tomatoes
o 1 small onion
o 4 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon oregano
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
•
Instructions:
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
o Slice potatoes, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o Layer vegetables in a baking dish, seasoning with oregano, salt, and pepper.
o Pour sautéed onion and garlic over the top.
o Bake for 45 minutes until vegetables are tender.
o Serve warm.
Briouats
•
Ingredients:
o 1/2 pound ground beef

o Mix coconut milk with cooked rice and let sit for 10 minutes.
o Serve rice with sliced mangoes.
Mapo Tofu
•
Ingredients:
o 1 block tofu
o 1/2 pound ground pork
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 tablespoon chili bean paste
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon rice wine
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1/4 cup chicken broth
o 1 tablespoon cornstarch
o 1/4 cup chopped green onions
•
Instructions:
o Cut tofu into cubes and set aside.
o Sauté ground pork, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.
o Add chili bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, and sugar, cook for 2 minutes.
o Add chicken broth and tofu, simmer for 5 minutes.
o Mix cornstarch with water and add to the pan, stirring until thickened.
o Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.
Mashed Potatoes
•
Ingredients:
o 4 potatoes
o 1/2 cup milk
o 1/4 cup butter
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
•
Instructions:
o Peel and dice potatoes.
o Boil potatoes until tender, then drain.
o Mash potatoes with milk, butter, salt, and pepper.
o Serve warm.
Minestrone
•
Ingredients:
o 1 onion
o 2 carrots
o 2 celery stalks
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 zucchini
